name: Mimikyu
author: Yuka Morii
flavor_text: Although it’s a quiet, lonely Pokémon, if you try to look at what’s under its rag, it will become agitated and resist violently.

abilities.name: Shadow Box
abilities.effect: Pokémon-GX that have any damage counters on them (both yours and your opponent’s) have no Abilities.

attacks.name: Tail Trickery
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.
